headline: Stylists offer free haircuts for people facing housing challenges at Hollywood church
author: David Crane
sentences:
For New York stylist Andrew Inconstanti, the effort allows him “to give back in a way that makes sense in our lives, it feels good to use our talent and professionalism to do what we can to help.”
Genevieve’s Garden at the Blessed Sacrament Catholic Church, located at 6657 Sunset Blvd., offers a place of rest for those being challenged with living on the streets.

Six stylists with Hair 4 Humanity were busy clipping away in the garden of the Sunset Boulevard church giving providing haircuts to people facing housing insecurity.
